tasks.compile-all: deno task compile-mac-arm && deno task compile-mac-intel && deno task compile-windows && deno task compile-linux-arm && deno task compile-linux-intel
tasks.compile-mac-arm: deno compile --allow-read --allow-env --allow-write --allow-net --output sssg_mac_arm --target aarch64-apple-darwin --include init main.ts
tasks.compile-mac-intel: deno compile --allow-read --allow-env --allow-write --allow-net --output sssg_mac_intel --target x86_64-apple-darwin --include init main.ts
tasks.compile-windows: deno compile --allow-read --allow-env --allow-write --allow-net --output sssg_windows --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --include init main.ts
tasks.compile-linux-arm: deno compile --allow-read --allow-env --allow-write --allow-net --output sssg_linux_arm --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu --include init main.ts
tasks.compile-linux-intel: deno compile --allow-read --allow-env --allow-write --allow-net --output sssg_linux_intel --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --include init main.ts
